Listing 4.6: Example of a multivariate time series dataset as a multi-step or sequence prediction
supervised learning problem.
Not many supervised learning methods can handle the prediction of multiple output values
without modiﬁcation, but some methods, like artiﬁcial neural networks, have little trouble. We
can think of predicting more than one value as predicting a sequence. In this case, we were
